Title: Relates to state party names; repealer
Summary: Prohibits a state party from using the word "Independent" or "Independence" in its name.
LawCode: Amd ยง2-124, rpld ยง2-124 sb 4, El L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to prohibition of state party names; and to repeal subdivision 4 of section 2-124 of such law relating thereto
